DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to test the safety & tolerability of intramuscular aripiprazole in acutely agitated patients diagnosed with Dementia.
DOC.brief_title: Intramuscular Aripiprazole in Acutely Agitated Patients Diagnosed With Dementia
DOC.criteria: Acute agitation in Patients with a DSMIV diagnosis of Alzheimer's, vascular or mixed Dementia. Current DSMIV Axis 1 diagnosis other than Alzheimer's, vascular or mixed Dementia.
DOC.keyword: Acute agitation in patients diagnosed with Dementia
